bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

div1.p: Raman Acevedo Dismissed as Chief of Cabinet [From the Henry Rose Carter Papers]

div1.head: Newspaper clipping, August 1, [1911] [Enclosed in C0127001]
div1.p:
Raman Acevedo Dismissed As Chief
of Cabinet.

Panama, Aug. 1.--The political situa-
tion here grows more complicated. The
friends of President Arosemena openly
assert that all Government employes who
do not favor his re-election will be re-
placed by those who do.

This unprecedented campaign was be-
gun yesterday with the issuance of a
decree replacing Ramon F. Acevedo, Sec-
retary of Government and chief of the
Cabinet, with Heliodoro Patino, who has
been the Secretary of Public Instruction.
The change amounts practically to the
dismissal of Acevedo. It is reported that
Gov. J. Arango, of the province of Pan-
ama, and Mayor Boyd, of this city, and
other high national and provincial em-
ployes also will be dismissed.
